issue.title: Report engine
issue.body:
**Original author :** Van Hoecke Hélène 

Iso functionnal migration from V2 to V4 of the "Report engine".


**Fixed versions :** 4.3.1

comments.body:
**Original author :** Van Hoecke Hélène 

This functionality is already released in the 4.3.1 version.
A documentation is asked by the COTEC, in the wiki section.

**Original author :** Mérour Xavier

Doc. done here : https://forge.easysdi.org/projects/easysdi/wiki/4_report_engine

To validate par PSC.
